Permission on "secrets"

  • GET /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/secrets (:read)
  • GET /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/secrets/:name (:read)
  • PUT /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/secrets/:name (:write)
  • DELETE /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/secrets/:name (:write)
  • GET /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/secrets/public-key (:read)
